message: I'm needing mailparse installed on my xampp. I've done pecl install mailparse but I get an error that mbstring is not installed, but it is.. so I'm doing /Applications/XAMPP/xamppfiles: sudo ./bin/pecl install --nodeps mailparse BUT.. when the make starts it fails with a big load of errors.
Any idea how to install mailparse with this configurations? maybe i'm doing things wrong but no idea what to do
If anyone interested on the solution. You need devel-package installed and run the installation having in mind that pecl must compile it for i386. export CFLAGS="-arch i386" does the trick
